examples.example: 我们已经完成了工作的部分，接下来要更加努力去完成剩下的。

translate.english: We have completed part of the work, and next we need to work harder to finish the rest.

examples.example: 这次考试我答对了大部分题目，感觉还不错。

translate.english: I answered most of the questions correctly in this exam and felt quite good.

examples.example: 整体的任务虽然很艰巨，但我们已经完成了部分，这给了我们很大的信心和动力。

translate.english: Although the overall task is very arduous, we have already completed a part, which gives us great confidence and motivation.
